org.apache.juneau.assertions

Class ByteArrayAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion
      • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentAssertion<R>
        • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentObjectAssertion<R>
          • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentArrayAssertion<R>
            • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentByteArrayAssertion<ByteArrayAssertion>
              • org.apache.juneau.assertions.ByteArrayAssertion

  • public class ByteArrayAssertion
extends FluentByteArrayAssertion<ByteArrayAssertion>
    Used for assertion calls against byte arrays.
    Example:

    // Validates the byte array contains the string "foo". assertBytes(myByteArray).hex().is("666F6F");
